name: Monster 4x4: Masters of Metal
description:
You are Rookie, a new monster truck driver just itching to show your stuff.

Race across the US, off-road, through famous monument, and in stadiums to show you are the best monster truck racer in the US!

Upgrade your Monster Jam trucks with powerups and new capabilities. Decide off-road which are the best choices to take as you race for cash and fame.
